column4: na ɔama ɔayɛ afo na ɔadan no ebutuw
column5: na ɔabɔ no do atsefo no apetse."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔman no tse no
column4: mbrɛ ɔsɔfo tse ara nye no; mbrɛ akowaa tse no
column5: mbrɛ no wura tse ara nye no; mbrɛ afonabaa tse no
column6: mbrɛ no wuraba tse ara nye no; mbrɛ ɔtɔfo tse no
column7: mbrɛ ɔtɔmfo tse ara nye no; mbrɛ ɔdzefɛmfo tse no
column8: mbrɛ ɔdzefirfo tse ara nye no; mbrɛ nsihogyefo tse no
column9: mbrɛ nsihomafo tse ara nye no."

column2: "Wɔbɔto asaase no no pan koraa na wɔafa no afo koraa: na EWURADZE na ɔakasa yi."
"Asaase so asɛɛ wɔ no do mba ase; osiandɛ woetsiatsia mbra no do
"Dɛm ntsi na ndom no amen asaase no; na no do atsefo woebu hɔn fɔ: dɛm ntsi na asaase no do atsefo no ahyew
"Wɔnnkɛfa adwontow anom nsa; nsa dzendzen bɛyɛ wen ama hɔn a wɔnom."
"Woedwuruw asakrabutuw kurow no: wɔatow ofi biara mu
"Osu wɔ mbɔntsen do wɔ wenyin ntsi; enyigye nyina ahyɛ sum
column3: asaase no do ehurusidzi etu kɔ."

column2: "Kurow no mu dza ɔaka nye amamfoyɛ
"Na dɛm na ɔbɛba asaase do wɔ aman mu
"Na wɔbɛma hɔn ndze do abɔ ose: EWURADZE akɛseyɛ ntsi wofi atɔe bɛtseatsea mu."
"Dɛm ntsi hom nhyɛ EWURADZE enyimnyam wɔ boka
column3: mekyerɛ EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn ne dzin no

column2: "Ofi asaase ano noho na yɛatse ndwom
column3: ɔtseneneenyi n’enyimnyam no. Naaso meka dɛ
ɔbɔtɔ mona no mu; na nyia obefi mona no mu epue no
column4: efir no bɛpa no. Na woebuebue ɔsor ntokura na asaase fapem rihihim."

column3: na oehimahima dɛ suaba; ne mbrato bɛyɛ no do dur

column4: EWURADZE bɛtsea sor dɔm wɔ sor

column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔboaboa mpokyerɛfo ano wɔ mona no mu
column5: na nda pii ekyir no wɔakɔ akɛsera hɔn."

column3: na ewia enyi ato; osiandɛ dɔm EWURADZE bedzi hen wɔ Zion bepɔw do
column5: na ne tsetsefo enyim enyimnyam mu."
